hopobject.name: A Home Security System
hopobject.body: The project fully documents a Home Security System from the initial design to the final implementation. Originally designed to use a Raspberry Pi, the design has changed in order to incorporate the BeagleBone Black. Design decisions, project builds, and software will be presented.
hopobject.shortdesc: A Home Security System that incorporates a BeagleBone Black as the central controller.
